title: Who do you think needs VGU or VU’s?
body: I’ve played League for about a month or two now and I’ve noticed how clunky are gross some characters look compared to others. The Morgana/Kayle updates really opened my eyes in terms of visual updates and gameplay updates. Personally I feel Sona and LeBlanc could use a visual tweak or two, but who else does?

replies.body:
{{champion:32}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:62}}  {{champion:59}} those are just outdated in terms of visuals sound effects and VO

The mere fact, that you included Zilean and especially Malphite & Tryndamere on VGU shows, that you are a patrician tier ChampUp enthusiast.
She is a cult leader or something in lore, in game she runs around almost half naked with ....also bad animations that ruin her skins, poor VO and her kit is problematic AF

{{champion:9}} : Speaking as a Fiddlesticks Enthusiast. His kit is pretty old & Archaic, only ability that has seen **any** significant changes over the last 10 year's is his [Passive: Dread]. Also for a champion that's supposed to instill **FEAR** into his opponents, He's not scaring anyone with those animations (Just watch him hop around the map, you'll see what I mean...). His updated lore (which is now canon for the time being) depicts him as a Reanimated Cadaver that was strung up in a field like a scarecrow who now preys on unwary travelers. Just imagine all the possibilities they can pull out for him. I can definitely see him coming to odds with Champions who have dealt with Supernatural Entities like Vayne or Lucian, simply because he's a Vengeful Spirit that was wronged & wasn't laid to rest.
#_**Verdict: Full-Scale VGU (Complete Relaunch)**_

{{champion:77}} : After reading **_"Silence for the Damned"_**, I'm honestly interested to see where these two guys go from here. There aren't many Shaman-themed Champions in League (Closest things we have are Karma & Illaoi) & Udyr could definitely fit the niche. Also being able to swap between different fighting styles at anytime depending on what you need is pretty neat (sorry Kayn, you & Rhaast can only do that once per game). I just wonder if they can somehow keep that kind of playstyle, but Modernize/improve on it.
#_**Verdict: VU/Small-scale VGU**_

{{champion:106}} : As for Volibear, he just sounds extremely intimidating & it just proves that Ornn wasn't joking around with the stuff he said about his brother. He **COMMANDS** your respect & if faced with him, I'd expect him to look the part. The Current Volibear doesn't convey this & he could honestly be way cooler than he already is. Aside from having his [Q: Rolling Thunder], they can probably make his gameplay **COMMAND** your respect as well.
#_**Verdict: Medium/Full-Scale VGU (Modernization)**_

{{champion:80}} : Ahh....The Aspect of War. Pantheon is currently 9 years old (February 2, 2010) & he's also using the same abilities since his launch. As one of the Aspects who fought against Aatrox, Pantheon has the opportunity to be one of the most badass champions in League. His current playstyle isn't exactly the healthiest, but I can see them giving him something similar to Warwick's Update. 
#_**Verdict: Full-scale VGU (Modernization)**_
{{champion:43}}

> [{quoted}](name=Sassmast3r,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sfffpBsv,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-02-28T01:49:26.452+0000)
>
> {{champion:43}}

This thread is for V(G)U's, not reverts.
Then again, a VU can come w/ a revert...
Ha. I like you, I'm friending you in League. That was even sassier than my abrupt comment with a picture of Karma and no explanation.

> [{quoted}](name=Sassmast3r,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sfffpBsv,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2019-02-28T19:13:23.994+0000)
>
> Ha. I like you, I'm friending you in League. That was even sassier than my abrupt comment with a picture of Karma and no explanation.

Ty, but I'm probably not going to log in for a few more months.


By then the bond we once shared will have faded.

I'd say Annie mainly because she was like the first VU, and could be brought up to date. There are others worse than her, but she feels like the same as Ezreal. She looks okay still but so much could still be done with her visually to match her cinematic, and maybe some kit changes because she barely sees the light of day in game now.

{{champion:62}} - Been waiting on an update for a while. likely a low level VGU so he can get his passive updated, some light changes to his kit here and there as well as update his skins. Not to mention with his ability effects being updated, it's really apparent that he REALLY some new mechanics cause his current kit doesn't accommodate visual effects interesting enough to be worth making skins for.

{{champion:2}} - idk about kit changes, don't really play him much but he could at LEAST use a VU.

{{champion:32}} - Same as Olaf. Can't say kit wise but Suction cup feet... 'nuff said.

{{champion:37}} Sona could at least use a new Q and either a new or updated E. Visual wise... I mean looking at her in the Ryze video I can already tell Riot has a newer look for her in mind.

{{champion:42}} - Really just want to see him go from looking like a tiny old man to a tiny old yordle with animal ears popping out the top of his flight cap.
My most-wanted is {{champion:42}} .  Make him a proper Yordle and bring him back to his glory days as an actual ADC!  We need to MAKE CORKI GREAT AGAIN!

NEEDS VISUAL UPDATES

{{champion:34}} Outdated model that could use a new look and better animations.

{{champion:79}} Big boy needs to put on some clothes and a much better model.

{{champion:24}} Its kinda hard to see what he is on his classic skin and a update could make him interesting.

He's getting a new walk soon :D

{{champion:26}} {{champion:9}} 

these 2 champions mostly imo ... theres other champs but i feel like with an update the scary scarecrow could really be fearsome on the map ... he doesnt feel scary to play against 

Zilean as well i feel could be pushed more into a time based champion ... dont get me wrong i like his kit but he doesnt feel like a time champion to me except for the ult .... the E just feels like a speed up and the bombs just feel like a standard bomb 

with a VGU these 2 could really be amazing in game
jax, malphite, maybe darius, pantheon, maybe cho gath, rumble, mundo, corki

Nocturne really needs a new visual update, but he also needs an actual rework. His ultimate is the only part of him I would like Riot to keep if they reworked him, maybe the q too, but it's so basic and boring. His w is not that great too, since he's an assassin but he has a spell shield. Also, Riot should change his e, since it doesn't bring much to him in burst.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

{{champion:12}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:34}} (I know that they recently reworked her abilities looks but dear lord why didn't they update her actual character model),{{champion:53}} (if you look at his in-game model up close, you'll know what I'm talking about), {{champion:36}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:82}} (He has one planned, but still, no idea when they plan on doing it),{{champion:111}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:26}}
Really almost anyone whose model was released before {{champion:122}} could use a VU or VGU.(and Quinn could use one too).

Why would Karthus need another VU?
His model was updated and looks fine.

The same goes for Yi(though in his case I could understand the desire for a design-change and gameplay-update).

Dont know, it was just one of the champs that came to mind. 

For Yi is more or less because his design is just all over the place, the goggles no longer really serving a purpose, the random sword boots, everything. Not to mention gameplay where there's just a massive disconnect between low elo and high elo making him flip flop between being a godsend or just straight up useless.
{{champion:7}} I want a total visual revamp on her.
Talon but who cares {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Vu's are always welcome. Recent vgu's on the other hand are complete failures. Look at irelia, akali and aatrox. They are balancing nightmares. One has to wonder if kayle will follow her predecessors.

Honestly all the old Champs need VU's(ofc excluding the ones who are already updated lol)...They just look outdated as hell. Even the more popular champs (lux and ahri) need VU's its not that their current model is bad but its just outdated with the new champs and what not. Just polishing the game would be nice as a goal for 2019. I was hoping 2019 would be the focus for that, but alas we still have pizza feet champs, and mordekaiser still looks like a trash can.

> [{quoted}](name=kayochan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sfffpBsv,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2019-02-28T15:39:33.861+0000)
>
> Honestly all the old Champs need VU's(ofc excluding the ones who are already updated lol)...They just look outdated as hell. 

Ok, well by what extent are you using to define a champion as "old"? As in their model is still the same from the game's initial release/beta? That their kit isn't up to standards to today's League?

>Even the more popular champs (lux and ahri) need VU's its not that their current model is bad but its just outdated with the new champs and what not. 

Isn't saying it's outdated still saying it's bad? Also, Riot doesn't do pure VUs anymore. The only way that can happen is with a full VGU, either on a Sion or Ezreal scale. What about all the other champs that desparately need updates like Fiddle? Riot should just keep them under the tire to update the already popular champs with their constant new skins?

>Just polishing the game would be nice as a goal for 2019. I was hoping 2019 would be the focus for that, but alas we still have pizza feet champs, and mordekaiser still looks like a trash can.

VGU one could argue are a way of polishing the game, and Riot still is working on updating champs, such as Mord currently. Outside of that, with how the community has been reacting to Riot's balance decisions for quite some time now, do you really think that was going to be a goal that everyone could agree was going to happen?

Old as in old champs, not much to it. They're outdated and need to be upgraded with the current aesthetic of the game..Im ignoring their kits for now, that can be changed with time, but im saying plain model updates. (which they somewhat did with the slightest of changes, and colors, and getting rid of the bulkiness in champs)  I know Rito wouldn't bother unless its a huge overhaul. I was just answering the question. 

No saying outdated doesn't mean bad. A lot of things are outdated but its not bad...hence why they're still there. Im just saying Ahri and Lux as examples, not "go work on the right away" I was saying in terms of even popular champs need a little love. Just to overall fit in with leagues new style, you can easily tell the new from the old. it would be nice to see all champs polished simply put. 

I know Rito is working on champs, i know theyre **trying** their best. Im just saying its 2019 and instead of releasing all these new champs they should focus on cleaning up this mess of a game in all aspects. But like I said, I was just answering the question. Don't really wanna bag on Riot more than I already do lol.
VU {{champion:110}} (but seeing as to how he is problematic, he might need a VGU at this point)

{{champion:117}} Compared to the other female yordles, she (especially her default skin) looks like a small, chewed up blob of bubblegum. Hope she gets visually updated to be on par with how Tristana and Poppy look after they got their visuals updated.

Other than that, I wouldn't mind visual updates for {{champion:37}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:61}}{{champion:16}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:40}}  to bring their models up to date to the current "standard".

{{champion:142}} 
This camp is easily the ugliest champ in the game.
Good lord please give {{champion:7}} a VU! She has so much potential for who she is...
